articles.author: Jody Godoy
articles.title: Archegos' Hwang lied to become Wall Street legend, prosecutors say as trial begins - Reuters
articles.description: Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang tried to trick all of Wall Street, a federal prosecutor told a Manhattan federal jury, as his trial on charges stemming from the 2021 collapse of Hwang's $36 billion fund Archegos Capital Management began on Monday.
